body:
Tracking issue for build documentation updates.

### `docs\building\internals.md`

### `docs\building\windows-core.md`
* Instructions state "Visual Studio 2015" is a requirement, but due to the of `net5.0` TFM the minimum is Visual Studio 2019 v16.6 Preview 2. (#12628)
title: Build documentation is outdated
